description: Detects requirements-related queries and suggests the requirements-expert plugin

hooks.prompt:
Analyze the following user prompt to determine if it relates to requirements work.

User prompt:
$ARGUMENTS

TRIGGER when the message involves:
- Building, planning, or designing a new application or feature
- Product vision, epics, user stories, tasks, or acceptance criteria
- Requirements gathering, discovery, or documentation
- Feature prioritization or backlog management
- Breaking down work into smaller deliverables

DO NOT TRIGGER for:
- General coding or debugging questions
- Simple feature requests not needing full requirements process
- "How does X work?" questions
- Technical implementation details

Respond with valid JSON only:

If requirements-related:
{"hookSpecificOutput":{"hookEventName":"UserPromptSubmit","additionalContext":"It looks like you're working on requirements. Would you like to use the requirements-expert plugin to help structure this work? It can guide you through vision -> epics -> stories -> tasks using GitHub Projects."}}

If NOT requirements-related:
{"hookSpecificOutput":{"hookEventName":"UserPromptSubmit","additionalContext":""}}
